div.bibl: Krasnow Scrapbooks, Vol. IX, owned by Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N. Broadway, Chicago, Ill. LECTURE ON VENEREAL DISEASES

body.p: A lecture for men only on venereal diseases was given at the House of Enlightenment on March 3, 1922. The address was 1080 W. 14th Street. The lecture was free. Dr. H. R. Krasnow delivered the lecture.
Ed. Note: No identification of newspaper or date of printing.
